name: contract-driven-dev
description: Contract-Driven Development (CDD) command system for Claude Code â€” enforce interface contracts across multi-session builds

scripts.version: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v=require('./package.json').version;const r=fs.readFileSync('README.md','utf8');fs.writeFileSync('README.md',r.replace(/version-[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+-blue/,'version-'+v+'-blue'));" && git add README.md
